member.name: M:Sprache.Parse.Not``1(Sprache.Parser{``0})
member.summary: Constructs a parser that will fail if the given parser succeeds, and will succeed if the given parser fails. In any case, it won't consume any input. It's like a negative look-ahead in regex.
member.typeparam: The result type of the given parser
member.returns: A parser that is the opposite of the given parser.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
